termsOneText: The terms of use of the site govern the interaction of travelers, guides and Tripster. All legal details are set out in the documents: the privacy policy, the agreement between the guide and the Tripster (accepted at registration, but actually starts working after the publication of the tour) and the contracts for the provision of excursion services between the guide and the traveler (accepted by the guide and the traveler upon making an advance payment for the excursion).
termsTwoText: The terms of use of the site govern the interaction of travelers, guides and Tripster. All legal details are set out in the documents: the privacy policy, the agreement between the guide and the Tripster (accepted at registration, but actually starts working after the publication of the tour) and the contracts for the provision of excursion services between the guide and the traveler (accepted by the guide and the traveler upon making an advance payment for the excursion).
